FuncDef: This command displays the contents of a text file.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the file contents to display. Values-local-url | remote-url|, local-url |[cflash-id/][file-path], |200 chars max, including cflash-id, |directory length 99 chars max each , remote-url|[{ftp://|tftp://}login:pswd@remote-locn/ [file-path] , |255 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |[hostname | ipv4-address | ipv6-address], ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses, cflash-id| cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:.
